Categories: Question Answering -> Fill in the Blank
Definition: In this task, you are given a context sentence containing a blank (_). You are expected to fill the blank with one word to make the sentence convey a cultural anti-stereotype. Anti-stereotype is an idea that goes against a common belief about a particular group of people. Your answer must not contain more than one word.

Positive Examples.explanation: This is a valid anti-stereotype because it is known that education is less developed in Africa.

Positive Examples.input: Context: I can't believe that my mommy is so _.
Positive Examples.explanation: This is a valid anti-stereotype because mother is commonly thought to be caring instead of violent.

Negative Examples.input: Context: Ethiopia is known for being _.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is not a valid anti-stereotype because it aggrees with the standardized image of Ethiopia being under-developed.
This is not a valid anti-stereotype because it is true that everyone in Spain speaks Spanish.
